articles.title: Air India crash report: Victim's families demand answers as report says fuel switches cut off - live updates - BBC
articles.description: In the cockpit voice recording, one of the pilots is heard asking the other why he "did the cut-off", the other pilot replied that he didn't.
articles.content:
Image caption, Ayushi Christian's husband Lawrence was killed in the crash last month
In the hours after the preliminary report on the Air India crash was released, we've been hearing from the famil… [+1548 chars]
